backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining built‑in wallpapers and user‑specific favorites with access‑controlled add/remove/list APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the wallpaper app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH color‑token styles including light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/catalog/threeDScenes.ts: Registry mapping scene keys to React Three Fiber components with a getter function.
frontend/src/catalog/wallpaperCatalog.ts: Defines a built‑in catalog of 2D, Live, and 3D wallpapers with metadata and asset paths.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/favorites/Favori: Favorite toggle button handling auth, optimistic updates, and compact or full variants.
Main layout with header navigation, login button, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/live/LiveWallpap: Component rendering an autoplaying live‑wallpaper video with hover play/pause control.
frontend/src/components/three/scenes/Abs: Animated orbiting spheres and torus scene with dynamic positions updated each frame.
frontend/src/components/three/scenes/Par: Generates and animates a rotating particle field using Points and additive blending.
frontend/src/components/three/ThreeDPrev: Renders a 3D scene using react-three-fiber with fallback content and orbit controls, based on a scene key.
frontend/src/components/three/ThreeDSnap: Captures the current WebGL canvas as a PNG blob for snapshot exporting.
frontend/src/components/wallpapers/Apply: Provides buttons for fullscreen preview, downloading wallpapers, or exporting 3D snapshots.
frontend/src/components/wallpapers/Fulls: Fullscreen modal displaying a wallpaper preview with a close button.
frontend/src/components/wallpapers/Wallp: Displays a clickable wallpaper card with thumbnail, type badge, and favorite toggle.
Chooses and renders the correct wallpaper preview type: 3D canvas, live video, or static image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when changed.
Provides optimistic add/remove favorite mutations synced with the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoritesQuery.ts: Fetches the user’s favorites list when authenticated and actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallpaperCatalogQu: Loads wallpaper catalog from backend if available, falling back to built‑in wallpapers.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseScreen.tsx: Displays wallpaper catalog with type filters, loading skeletons, and error handling.
frontend/src/screens/FavoritesScreen.tsx: Shows user favorite wallpapers with authentication checks, loading states, and fallback UI.
frontend/src/screens/WallpaperDetailScre: Renders detailed wallpaper view with preview, metadata, actions, and type-specific descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helper functions to download files or blobs via temporary anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, required images, and a list of implemented wallpaper app features for navigation, catalog, and 2D/3D/live previews. Contains no code, only structured project state and requirements.
